channel.title: [Solved] How to install Bitcoin Core 0.9.1 on Whonix 8?
channel.description: Good day. I downloaded the Bitcoin Core 0.9.1 client on a Workstation of Whonix 8. Tried to install through the terminal and through Dolphin. Does not work(). Could you help me run this Bitcoin wallet? I would be grateful for any help.

item.title: [Solved] How to install Bitcoin Core 0.9.1 on Whonix 8?
item.dc:creator: JasonJAyalaP
item.description:
I suggest using one of the lightweight BTC clients that don’t download the whole blockchain. Last I checked, Electrum and Multibit are popular. Electrum is in the debian repos I believe.

Read full topic
item.source: [Solved] How to install Bitcoin Core 0.9.1 on Whonix 8?

item.title: [Solved] How to install Bitcoin Core 0.9.1 on Whonix 8?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Instructions don’t differ from those installing Bitcoin on Debian.

Due to blockchain download, you may not be entirely happy with original Bitcoin-qt btc client. Takes ages to download and process, even when not using VMs/Tor.

You might get better help for example from http://unix.stackexchange.com/ or other specialized Linux/Debian/Bitcoin forum.

Read full topic
item.source: [Solved] How to install Bitcoin Core 0.9.1 on Whonix 8?
